---
id: takeWhile
---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## takeWhile() function

返回获取值只要每个值满足给定的 `f` 的 Iterable/AsyncIterable<!-- -->。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function takeWhile<A, B>(
  f: (a: A) => B,
  iterable: Iterable<A>,
): IterableIterator<A>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iter = takeWhile((a) => a < 3, [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]);
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 1}
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 2}
iter.next(); // {done:true, value: undefined}

// with pipe
pipe(
  [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6],
  takeWhile((a) => a < 3),
  toArray,
); // [1, 2]

await pipe(
  Promise.resolve([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]),
  takeWhile((a) => a < 3),
  toArray,
); // [1, 2]

// if you want to use asynchronous callback
await pipe(
  Promise.resolve([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]),
  toAsync,
  takeWhile(async (a) => a < 3),
  toArray,
); // [1, 2]

// with toAsync
await pipe(
  [
    Promise.resolve(1),
    Promise.resolve(2),
    Promise.resolve(3),
    Promise.resolve(4),
    Promise.resolve(5),
    Promise.resolve(6),
  ],
  toAsync,
  takeWhile((a) => a < 3),
  toArray,
); // [1, 2]
```

[Try It](https://codesandbox.io/s/fxts-takewhile-e6gqt)

see [pipe](https://fxts.dev/zh/api/pipe)<!-- -->, [toAsync](https://fxts.dev/zh/api/toAsync)<!-- -->, [toArray](https://fxts.dev/zh/api/toArray)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/takeWhile.ts)
